Issue.creator: ozheregelya
Issue.summary: Docker pool can't be built because of new python3-indy-crypto in sdk repo
Issue.description: Installed-Size: 12.3 kB Depends: libindy-crypto Homepage: https://github.com/hyperledger/indy-crypto License: MIT/Apache-2.0 Vendor: none Download-Size: 5,608 B APT-Sources: https://repo.sovrin.org/sdk/deb xenial/rc amd64 Packages Description: This is the official wrapper for Hyperledger Indy Crypto library (https://www.hyperledger.org/projects).{code} *Expected Results:* Need to add installation of python3-indy-crypto=0.4.1 to the dockerfile. >
